sentence.Network_en: Geophysical exploration is a relatively new area of technology.

sentence.Network_en: One method used in a geophysical exploration is called seismic method.
sentence.Network_cn: 地球物理勘探的一种方法就是地震法.

sentence.Network_en: The distinction between geophysical and geological branches of earth science is not clear - cut.
sentence.Network_cn: 地质和地球物理这两个地球科学分支的差别并不泾渭分明.
